title: Lactobacillus paracasei from Koumiss Ameliorates Diarrhea in mice via Tight Junctions Modulation

Galactooligosaccharides (GOS) and 2′-fucosyllactose (2′-FL) can directly suppress growth of specific pathogenic microbes and impact phagocytosis of neutrophils: Effects of GOS and 2-FL on bacterial growth and phagocytosis
